<title level="1" right="Trait">[Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 455 <sup>2.0</sup>

An effect with this trait applies one or more diseases. A disease is typically an affliction.
name: Disease
